ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Last year (2019) a huge medical camp was held on behalf of our foundation in the village of Sunguvarchatram in Kanchipuram district. More than 100 of them received public eye examinations and free spectacles. And this year (2020) during the Corona period many villagers in Kanchipuram district were provided with essential food items and essential items for the last 3 months.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Since our foundation was newly established this year (2019) we have not received a large amount of funding. Nevertheless, many social activists helped our organization by giving as much funding as they could. They are around Rs. 11000 / - in the year 2019-2020 alone. This year our camp provided medical camps and educational equipment for children in some villages. We have thereby recorded the receipts and expenditure for this year

For our foundation, the total amount of funding given so far this year (2020-2021) by social activists is Rs.13000. This year through our foundation many villages were provided with the necessary safety equipment to be safe from corona impact. Also, food parcels were distributed to people around our area during the curfew for the past three months. We have thereby recorded the receipts and expenditure for the year to date.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: As an established organisation with two decades of experience, The Banyan is on the frontlines of innovation in the mental health and development sectors, and in a unique position to build momentum and transform niche experiments and innovations into regime level systems that focus on breaking down structural barriers to care, and are more responsive to the social ecology of mental health, homelessness and poverty. By obtaining the grant from Oak Foundation, The Banyan can successfully transition into the regime level and evolve policy directions to address persistent and complex barriers to care that further exacerbate mental health issues, such as rural poverty, poor quality human resources, and lack of access to appropriate support services.
